cs213.photoAlbum.model
Class Photo

java.lang.Object
  cs213.photoAlbum.model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The Photo class contains:
- Unique file name
- Name of the user photo belongs to
- Caption
- Timestamp

Author:
dryu
